page.title: 13Thorpe Village
page.content: {Thorpe}village is{North West}of {Rotherham}Centre.{Thorpe}village is {South West}of{Wentworth.}The people in {Thorpe}live in a{dormitory}village that means that they work somewhere else and not in{Thorpe}village.{Thorpe village has only a few shops. There is a{chapel}and a{church.}There are several{pubs}including the{Horse and {Tiger, the Masons Arms}and the{Red {Lion.}There are some old houses in centre of{Thorpe}but there has been a lot of new building. There are three new{housing estates}in{Thorpe}now and there are still lots of new houses being built.There are plans to build new{schools}at{Thorpe}as well. On the Wimpey estate all the roads are named after rare birds.The{village}is surrounded by open space which is mainly{farmland.
